DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 study determine efficacy safety canfosfamide treatment relapse refractory mantle cell lymphoma , diffuse large B cell lymphoma multiple myeloma . The study conduct two stage 5-6 patient indication Stage 1 response observe additional 10 patient Stage 2 group .
DOC.brief_title: Study Canfosfamide Refractory Relapsed Mantle Cell , Diffuse Large B Cell Lymphoma Multiple Myeloma
